website_summaries.verdict: Choose this premium front-load washer if you want the perfect combination of user-friendly features and easy-to-use functions without spending hundreds of dollars more for features you may never use.
pros: Stands out for offering a 15 min
wash cycle that comes in handy when you're in a hurry
Has 9 wash cycles and a steam cycle
Earns praise for being quiet, easy to use, and for doing a great job cleaning even the dirtiest laundry
ft. capacity is practical for most homeowners' needs
Price falls in the middle of the spectrum for washers in its class
cons: Doesn't have as many features as pricier models we considered, but this isn't a deal breaker for every consumer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Brand new unit and it's got a faulty inlet valve. Such a bad unit. Do not buy this make or model!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: It’s so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love Electrolux!!! When my original washer stopped working, i looked at the bigger stores to buy this again. No one carries it. So i found it here. I love my electolux. The door to get the clothes in is wider then the other front loader doors. It’s quiet when dining and cleans my clothes so well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Door leaks water
customer_reviews.text: Less than half year and the door is leaking water, creating a puddle on the floor. The door is kept clean with no dents, the machine is essentially brand new. This machine is still covered by the manufacturer’s warranty but it takes a minimum of three weeks to get somebody to stop by. The warranty service department promised to follow-up with a phone call to confirm repair date but never did, so the warranty process needs to be started from scratch. Also, the manufacturer doesn’t allow feedback like this to be posted on their feedback page.
customer_reviews.author: Schnacka

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: bought this model along with the matching dryer in February if 2017. I am on my 3rd service call for the washer. The washer leaks during the clean washer cycle (there appears to be no fix for this). The 15 minute wash cycle has automatically changed itself to 20 minutes, literally (this is the time that appears on the screen). Now the control panel has died and apparently this part is on back order. All for a 2 year old $1,000 washing machine. Look elsewhere! Actually worthy of 0 stars! The dryer has an even spottier service history.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we purchased the front load washer and dryer together in 2017. In 2019 the washing machine needed a new pump, new heater and the repairman told me" he thought that the electric panel was going." Electrolux does not stand by their products. We did not purchase the extended warranty and was told that we should have done so. Our LF lasted 15 years. Never did I expect a product to stop working after 2 years, 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L.

customer_reviews.title: It's gonna leak. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.text: It leaks, it holds soap, it vibrates itself to pieces. If you're reading the good reviews they're for NEW purchases. The bad reviews are from people who've owned this cheap leaky garbage for more than a year. You're probably gonna buy this ElectroSux piece of trash anyway but when it leaks and destroys your hardwood floors or starts a mold farm on your carpet, you were warned.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Gross liner despite regular cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Liner disgusting even after doing regular Afresh and tub cleaning. Cost about $300 to replace but tech said it would just get this way again. 🤢🤮. Even used pipe cleaners and wipes but it wouldn’t touch places you can’t physically get to. Bought washer about 2 1/2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Best we have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This washer is fabulous. Best stain removal we have ever had. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Door leaks and takes to long to wash clothes. The 15 minute cycle added time. I regret buying. Have had it serviced twice covered by the warranty and still not fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had to have someone out to repair the unit 5-6 times within 2 years for leaks. It's main tub bearing is now going out. Will never buy Electrolux again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Rygiel

customer_reviews.title: The Worst Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this garbage. Get LG it will last year 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Skorev
